comments.raw_text: Azure will no longer support EXTEND_NONE. It is rarely depended upon by the tree, but often implicitly used, to avoid unintended behavioral differences we should make Cairo-thebes use EXTEND_PAD unless explicitly told otherwise.
comments.text: Azure will no longer support EXTEND_NONE. It is rarely depended upon by the tree, but often implicitly used, to avoid unintended behavioral differences we should make Cairo-thebes use EXTEND_PAD unless explicitly told otherwise.
